articles.author: Melanie Mason, Dustin Gardiner
articles.title: Gavin Newsom: 'I don't think Donald Trump wants another election' - Politico
articles.description: The California governor painted a bleak picture of the state of American democracy under President Trump.
articles.content: Newsom stating that the rule of law is being replaced by the rule of Don predicted the federal agents would be sent to voting booths and polling places across the country. But he later questioned whe… [+1649 chars]
